column4: i try to install libdvdcss2 and it tells me "Error:Dependency is not satisfyable : libdvdcss2

2008-01-04T23:27:00.000Z	pmratpoison	justin__	which method are you using?
2008-01-04T23:33:00.000Z	pmratpoison	justin__	: the way I made it work. I enabled the medibuntu repository, as per the instructions on site. Then I did sudo apt-get update Then I opened synaptic and I searched for medibuntu. Then I installed everything I had wanted
